name: Get_restaurant_details

observation.name: Piccola Cucina Estiatorio
observation.description: Piccola Cucina Estiatorio offers typical Sicilian and Greek food.
observation.address: 75 Thompson St, New York City, NY 10012-4345

observation.name: Piccola Cucina Estiatorio
observation.description: Piccola Cucina Estiatorio offers typical Sicilian and Greek food.
observation.address: 75 Thompson St, New York City, NY 10012-4345

response_summary:
Piccola Cucina Estiatorio is a highly rated Sicilian and Greek restaurant located at 75 Thompson Street in New York City. With an impressive 4.8-star rating from 983 reviews, it ranks second among 12,618 restaurants in the city. The majority of diners have given it perfect 5-star ratings, praising dishes like cacio e pepe, pasta, and bucatini. 

The restaurant serves authentic Italian and Sicilian cuisine, offering vegetarian, vegan, and gluten-free options. It operates from 11:30 AM to 11:00 PM from Sunday to Thursday, extending until midnight on Fridays and Saturdays. While currently closed, it typically provides dining options like lunch and dinner, with services including delivery, takeout, and reservations. 

Priced in the mid-range ($$ - $$$), Piccola Cucina Estiatorio is known for its cozy atmosphere and quality food. You can find their menu online or explore delivery options through Grubhub. For more details, visit their website or contact them via phone or email.
enhance_func_desc: This API is ideal for food enthusiasts and travelers seeking detailed restaurant information. It retrieves comprehensive details about a specific restaurant using its unique ID, including cuisine type, operating hours, price range, and customer ratings. The response also covers dietary options, services (delivery/takeout), and contact information, helping users make informed dining choices. The restaurant ID must be provided to fetch these details.

enhanced_parameters.id: Unique identifier for the restaurant, used to fetch detailed information.

name.description: The name of the restaurant (e.g., 'Piccola Cucina Estiatorio').

description.description: A brief description of the restaurant's cuisine (e.g., 'Piccola Cucina Estiatorio offers typical Sicilian and Greek food.').

reviews.description: Total number of reviews received by the restaurant.

rating.description: Average rating of the restaurant, typically on a scale of 1 to 5.

link.description: URL to the restaurant's page on TripAdvisor.

email.description: Contact email address for the restaurant.

phone.description: Contact phone number for the restaurant.

website.description: URL to the restaurant's official website.

featured_image.description: URL to a featured image of the restaurant.

current_rank.description: Current rank of the restaurant among others in the city.

total.description: Total number of restaurants ranked in the city.

address.description: Full street address of the restaurant.

detailed_address.description: Detailed breakdown of the restaurant's address.

street.description: Street name and number of the restaurant.

city.description: City where the restaurant is located.

postal_code.description: Postal code of the restaurant's location.

state.description: State where the restaurant is located.

country_code.description: Country code of the restaurant's location.

latitude.description: Geographical latitude coordinate of the restaurant.

longitude.description: Geographical longitude coordinate of the restaurant.

reviews_per_rating.description: Breakdown of reviews by star rating (1 to 5 stars).

review_keywords.description: List of keywords frequently mentioned in reviews.

ar_items.description: A keyword or phrase from reviews (e.g., 'cacio e pepe').

is_open.description: Indicates whether the restaurant is currently open.

open_hours.description: Opening and closing hours for each day of the week.

meal_types.description: List of meal types served (e.g., lunch, dinner).

dining_options.description: List of available dining options (e.g., delivery, takeout).

owner_types.description: List of owner types (currently empty in the example).

top_tags.description: List of tags associated with the restaurant.

depends_on.reason: The source API response field 'id' from 'Get_restaurant_details' is exactly the same as the target parameter 'id' required by the target API 'Get_restaurant_details'. This represents a hard dependency as the restaurant ID is a mandatory input for fetching detailed restaurant information. The data types match perfectly (Number), and the example value provided in the response field corresponds to the expected format of the target parameter.

The 'List_Restaurants_By_Search_Query' API serves as a necessary prerequisite for the 'Get_restaurant_details' API, as it provides the unique restaurant IDs required to fetch detailed information. The 'id' field from the search results matches exactly with the 'id' parameter needed by the target API, both in data type (Number) and purpose (unique restaurant identifier). This represents a hard dependency as the search API must be called first to obtain valid IDs for the details API.

There is a clear business association between the 'Search_Restaurants' API and the 'Get_restaurant_details' API, as the former provides the necessary restaurant IDs that are required to call the latter. The 'id' field from the 'Search_Restaurants' response matches exactly with the 'id' parameter required by 'Get_restaurant_details' in both data type (Number) and purpose (unique restaurant identifier). This represents a hard dependency as the search API must be called first to obtain valid IDs for the details API.
